key: F

Intro (2x)
Gm F / / | C#dim7 Dm / / |

Verse 1 *1
   Dm7              C/E                 F
My heart has always longed for something  more
  Dm7                   Bb                F2
I searched the stars to knock on Heaven's door
      Dm7              C2/E          F2
Cre - ation groans for God  to be re -  vealed
Dm7            Bb           F2
Every wound we carry will be   healed
               G7/B                   Bbm6
My eyes on the Son, Lord Your will be done

Chorus 1 *2
             Gm     F                   C#dim7   Dm
Thine is the King - dom, the power, the glo    - ry
            Gm   F                   C#dim7   Dm
Forever and e  - ver, He finished my sto    - ry
              Gm     F/A              C#dim7   Dm
We’re singing free - dom, our testi - mo     - ny
                       G13   Gm7/C     F  A7(#9)/E Dm11
We’ll be singing for - ev  - er,   a - men
         Dm/C          G13      G13(#5) Gm7/C     F
We’ll be singing for - ever and ever,         a - men

Verse 2 *3
Dm7            C/E           F
Beautiful each color that He made
     Dm7             Bb        F2
Your love's the only remedy for   hate
Dm7              C2/E               F2
You'll return to set  the pris'ners free
     Dm7               Bb              F2
‘Til then Your will on Earth be done in   me
               G7/B                   Bbm6
My eyes on the Son, Lord Your will be done

Interlude 1 (4x) *5
Dm7 / C/E / | F / Bb2 / |

Bridge (3x) *6-7
Dm7           C/E          F      Bb2
    If you've ever wondered  What Heaven looks like
Dm7 C/E                      F      Bb2
        It’s looking like me and you
Dm7           C/E            F      Bb2
    If you've ever questioned  What Heaven sounds like
Dm7 C2/E                  F       Bb2
         Just let it fill the room

        Just let it fill the room
